A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The original trilogy was rooted in the experiment of executing time tested tropes of storytelling\, sans contemporary trends or cultural boundaries\, with the facade of an unrecognizable world.  The facade is quite detailed and marketed for this now familiar world\, I only wish that equal or more resources were invested into the foundation.  I assert that investment is what made the originals a timeless inspiration to generations\, not just a good payday.
